TI: [Changes in corticosterone binding by receptors in various structures of the rat brain during immobilization stress].
AB: Corticosterone binding by the cytosol receptors after immobilization of adrenalectomized rats, was studied. A decrease in the specific binding of corticosterone occurred in cerebral cortex and hippocampus, but not in hypothalamus.
TT: Izmeneniia sviazyvaniia kortikosterona retseptorami v razlichnykh strukturakh mozga krys pri immobilizatsionnom stresse.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1987 Apr;73(4):465-8.
